org.apache.giraph.io.hcatalog

类 GiraphHCatInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,org.apache.hcatalog.data.HCatRecord>
      • org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce.HCatBaseInputFormat
        • org.apache.giraph.io.hcatalog.GiraphHCatInputFormat

  • public class GiraphHCatInputFormat
extends org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce.HCatBaseInputFormat
    Provides functionality similar to HCatInputFormat, but allows for different data sources (vertex and edge data).

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String EDGE_INPUT_JOB_INFO
      Edge input job info for HCatalog.
      static String VERTEX_INPUT_JOB_INFO
      Vertex input job info for HCatalog.
